016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.client;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers.DnsLookupService;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.common.LocalStreamFactories;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageWorkers;
024import jakarta.inject.Inject;
025import jakarta.inject.Provider;
026import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
027import org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient;
028import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
029import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
030import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
031import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
032
033/**
034 * Note: this is set to run level 0 primarily so that client streams are the last to close when an application shuts down.
035 */
036@Service(name = "reactivestreams.client")
037@ContractsProvided({ReactiveStreamsClient.class, PreDestroy.class})
038@RunLevel(0)
039public class ReactiveStreamsClientServiceHK2 extends ReactiveStreamsClientService
040        implements PreDestroy {
041
042    @Inject
043    public ReactiveStreamsClientServiceHK2(Configuration configuration,
044                                           MessageWorkers messageWorkers,
045                                           HttpClient httpClient,
046                                           DnsLookupService dnsLookup,
047                                           MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
048                                           Provider<LocalStreamFactories> localStreamFactoriesProvider,
049                                           Logger logger) throws Exception {
050        super(configuration, messageWorkers, httpClient, dnsLookup, metricRegistry, localStreamFactoriesProvider::get, logger);
051    }
052}
